title: Diamond Filigree Grandeur: Rose Gold Bridal Set
materials: studded with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Each diamond is SI clarity or better
G-H color. Meticulously handcrafted with a fine filigree technique.
features: This contemporary set takes inspiration from traditional South Indian designs, featuring intricate filigree work. The necklace showcases a graduated design, culminating in a stunning central pendant. The earrings echo this design, offering graceful movement and sparkle. The use of rose gold gives a modern touch to the traditional patterns.
occasions: Perfect for a grand wedding reception
or any high-profile event where you want to make a statement. Its contemporary design makes it also suitable for modern cocktail parties.
description: A unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The rose gold adds a modern touch, while the intricate filigree work showcases the skill of our artisans. This set is an investment piece that will be treasured for generations.
